select last_insert_id()
mapper.select: SELECT s.sno, s.storeNumber, s.storeAddress, s.email, s.storePhone, s.storeName FROM tbl_store AS s WHERE s.sno = #{sno};

SELECT * FROM tbl_store WHERE sno > 0
storeName like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
email like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY sno DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{size}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM tbl_store WHERE sno > 0
storeName like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
email like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
LIMIT #{countEnd} ) as tbl_store

SELECT DATE(o.registDate) AS registDate, p.productName, SUM(p.productPrice * o.orderCount) as totalSales FROM tbl_order AS o INNER JOIN tbl_product AS p ON p.pno = o.pno INNER JOIN tbl_store AS s ON s.sno = o.sno WHERE s.sno = #{sno} GROUP BY DATE(o.registDate), p.productName ORDER BY DATE(o.registDate), p.productName

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.registDate, '%Y-%m') AS registMonth, p.productName, SUM(p.productPrice * o.orderCount) as totalSales FROM tbl_order AS o INNER JOIN tbl_product AS p ON p.pno = o.pno INNER JOIN tbl_store AS s ON s.sno = o.sno WHERE s.sno = #{sno} GROUP BY registMonth, p.productName ORDER BY registMonth, p.productName;
